list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who walks for long distances, especially across country.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an experienced hiker in the Himalayas
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một người leo núi có kinh nghiệm ở dãy Hy Mã Lạp Sơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or group that sharply increases something, especially a price.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was a hiker of taxes
